name: Wilding Stride
text: Your wild-hearted drive and honed physique allow you to move with great swiftness.
benefit: Your base speed increases by 10 feet. This does not stack with the fast movement class feature or similar effects, unless that class feature or effect provides an enhancement bonus.
text_zh: 你的狂野冲动与健壮体格使你的行动更加迅捷。
benefit_zh: 你的基本陆上速度增加10尺。这不会与快速移动能力或类似效果叠加，除非该能力或效果提供的是增强加值。
